admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Financial Sector Loan Project
            will provide credit to cover the foreign exchange cost of
            industrial equipment imported by private firms seeking to
            acquire, build, modernize or replace productive assets. The
            median economic rate of return estimated for subprojects
            approved under the first Industrial Finance Project is 25%,
            and similar investment performance is expected under the
            proposed project. The project will also provide technical
            assistance for the training of managers in private financial
            institutions and in related Government agencies. The project
            will also address financial and institutional issues related
            to KLB (Korea Long-Term Credit Bank) and KDB (Korea
            Development Bank) that were initiated under previous
            projects involving these institutions.
